display_long_description:
Skill Point is a fast-paced VR game that challenges your reflexes, accuracy, and focus through a series of short, skill-based mini-games. Each playthrough gives you 7 randomized challenges — from catching and throwing to memory, balance, and precision tasks.

With easy-to-learn mechanics and tight timing, every session tests how well you perform under pressure. The faster and cleaner your execution, the more points you earn.

Play in either immersive mode for full VR presence or passthrough mode to stay connected to your real-world space — both options are available in the settings.

Designed for replayability, Skill Point is perfect for quick sessions or daily improvement streaks. Every completed game earns you points, and new challenge combinations keep it fresh. You can also join the Monthly Challenge, where your high score is compared globally.

Features:

- 7 randomized mini-games per session

- Throw, catch, memorize, balance, react

- VR-native mechanics with smooth controls

- Switch between immersive and passthrough modes

- Monthly global leaderboard challenge

Sharpen your skills. Beat your high score. Compete with the world.
[media]
